nio/TwitterSearch.description: A block that searches Twitter statuses.

at.title: Referenced users
at.description: list of users who were referenced in tweets using `@` character

count.title: Max Results
count.description: maximum tweets to notify from search results

geo.title: Geographical
geo.description: Radius, Latitude, and Longitude for location search.

hashtags.title: Hashtags
hashtags.description: hashtags to search for in tweets

interval.title: Query Interval
interval.description: how often the API is polled

lookback.title: Query Lookback (days)
lookback.description: how far to look back for tweets

result_type.title: Result Type
result_type.description: choose between `POPULAR`, `RECENT` or `MIXED` to specify what types of tweets to notify from search

tude.title: Tone
tude.description: choose from `NEUTRAL`, `QUESTION`, `NEGATIVE` and `POSITIVE` to specify the tone of the tweets that should be notified from block

tweet_text.title: Text includes
tweet_text.description: keywords to search for in tweets

default.description: Results of the twitter search based on the blocks configuration.
